mapper.insert: insert into drom(did, dcollege, darea, dblock, dflor, dunit, dbed, dstate) values (#{did},#{dcollege},#{darea},#{dblock}, #{dflor},#{dunit},#{dbed},#{dstate})
mapper.update:
update drom
did = #{did},
dcollege = #{dcollege},
darea = #{darea},
dblock = #{dblock},
dflor = #{dflor},
dunit = #{dunit},
dbed = #{dbed},
dstate = #{dstate},
where did = #{did}
